name: Sausasparataters
ingredients: salt, pepper and garlic powder to taste (1/2 tsp. each?)
instructions: Peel and cube potatoes; slice sausage and asparagus into bite-size chunks. Melt butter in 10" skillet. Add potatoes; sprinkle on seasonings and cover. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until soft (heat may be turned up briefly to brown potatoes). Add sausage and asparagus to skillet and continue cooking/stirring until desired doneness.
